name: QUIERO HACERLO, Inc.
description: Provider of transcription services intended to offer speech-to-text transcriptions. The company's platform offers audio transcription service to train, test and tune voice machines, creating folders for each file or project and accessing live visibility about transcript progression and downloading them when they are ready, enabling companies to access their platform to load recording files to transcribe at any time and at a low cost.
one_liner: Provider of transcription services intended to offer speech-to-text transcriptions. The company's platform offers audio transcription service to train, test and tune voice machines, creating folders for each file or project and accessing live visibility about transcript progression and downloading them when they are ready, enabling companies to access their platform to load recording files to transcribe at any time and at a low cost.
